title: Review: Gyllenhaal's 'Nightcrawler' Is Pulp With A Purpose
teaser: Kenneth Turan reviews Nightcrawler, a thriller set in the "nocturnal underbelly" of Los Angeles. Jake Gyllenhaal plays a young man who discovers the world of L.A. crime journalism.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
